metadata.synopsis: A Shar cultist speculating about what is going to happen following the defeat of Viconia, the cult's now-former leader.

0.speaker: Sharran Novice Greymask
0.text: Dark Lady, all is changed. Give us guidance.
0.context: NodeContext: Unsure, seeking solace. Murmuring a quiet prayer to self/the Goddess Shar, after surviving a coup and battle against the (now former) leader of the Shar cult.

1.speaker: Sharran Novice Greymask
1.text: I remain your humble servant, Lady Shar. I will serve whoever you desire.
1.context: NodeContext: Unsure, seeking solace. Murmuring a quiet prayer to self/the Goddess Shar, after surviving a coup and battle against the (now former) leader of the Shar cult.

2.speaker: Sharran Novice Greymask
2.text: Let your darkness shield us in uncertain times, Lady Shar.
2.context: NodeContext: Unsure, seeking solace. Murmuring a quiet prayer to self/the Goddess Shar, after surviving a coup and battle against the (now former) leader of the Shar cult.

3.speaker: Sharran Novice Greymask
3.text: If you require my life, so be it. I am yours, Nightsinger. Now and always.
3.context: NodeContext: Unsure, seeking solace. Murmuring a quiet prayer to self/the Goddess Shar, after surviving a coup and battle against the (now former) leader of the Shar cult.
